idea-plugin.name: kotlin-builder-generator
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin provides the ability to create builder classes for a Kotlin Class

Steps:
  1. ALT+ENTER on the class name
  2. Select generate builder option
  3. Choose the package
  4. Builder will be generated in that package
